message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CV 

The paper deals with the problem of classification in a hierarchical structure, which is a common problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper specifically focuses on text classification, which falls under the sub-categories of natural language processing (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), and machine learning (cs.LG). The proposed evaluation measures and their empirical testing involve the use of algorithms and statistical methods, which are also relevant to the sub-categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and computer vision (cs.CV).
